HasFlags.AddIRCMessage: How? What the fuck is your problem??
I've done my part perfectly, what else do you need?
You are so pathetic now. I thought you've got something inside to be superior among others
Perhaps I was wrong
Wrong about what? What did you portrayed out of me? A killer? You have Slayer for that, I am a hacker, and I've done my part here
What do you want me to say? "Please kill those innocent sick people so I can talk to a motherfucker who ruined my life", - is that it?
As you wish...
!ANNOUNCEMENT! HaHaTrap SCRIPT ACTIVATED @channel
Wha.. What the fuck man??
ARE YOU MENTALLY CHALLENGED? I DIDN'T ASK FOR THAT!
You should've. You can thank me later
I suggest you to think about results that you will achieve, instead of means that was actually necessary
@Deladello, scan all mass media about what we've done, I want every single person in California to know what happened
Sure thing
@Deladello, what the fuck is wrong with you people? I thought you wanted money. Your client isn't even replied yet!

We may seem like a bloodthirsty group, but in fact only Slayer is like that. And you are right, we are into this because of money. We would've get 4 350 000 dollars tops out of Operation Venomous Snake. The announcement of Omicron says that he is paying a million
I don't see any logic, it is less profitable. I still cannot understand why we just murdered 58 people!
Million dollars EACH. Meaning 6 000 000 dollars to the whole group. Including you
But you will participate only if you accept our rules. If you forgot how we do things around here, check out Oath file on our crossroads server once again
Nice! I contacted client, he already saw the news, and he is more than happy actually
Apperantly he can lobe his medical project now
Great, I hope we can benefit from it as well
@channel Are we done? I want to share some experience
I've got like California's biggest burger on my plate and I think

No, I made my mind
Those 58 people are dying anyway, I just ease their pain and meet my ultimate enemy
That's the spirit
